jobDescription: CONTRACT POSITION IN HOLLYWOOD, CA: 4 - 8 Weeks, starting immediatelyLOCAL APPLICANTS ONLYResponsibilities: Champion data-driven culture by proactively using data to strategize, make responsible decisions, ask smart questions, and translate that data into relatable stories  Define, model, analyze, and measure key performance indicators and socialize facts (and corresponding caveats) to business stakeholders  Work closely with business partners to design and evolve dashboards for key business performance indicators and metrics  Communicate complicated topics across the organization in a way that is friendly and accessible to a diverse audience  Proactively identify key strategic questions and problems; offer productive solutions focused on long-term and scalable benefits Minimum Qualifications: Bachelors Degree in a technical discipline with strong experience in data & business analysis  5+ years as a Data Scientist / Senior Analyst or related position with significant quantitative and analytical experience  Ability to manipulate and transform data to set up data pipelines for reporting and analysis  Expert level knowledge:  Scripting language: R (preferred), Python, or similar  Relational data: SQL (MySQL and/or Redshift preferred,)  Business Intelligence: Domo (preferred), Tableau, Looker or similar  Strong data visualization skills S  Strong project management skills; the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and the desire to bring structure to undefined processes  Real world experience analyzing messy data and communicating findings to non-technical audience. Preferred Qualifications: Familiarity with site analytics and experiment design (e.g. A/B testing)  Ability to generate complex analyses thats scalable, reproducible, and to present subsequent insights across teams and to management  Experience with event and/or e-commerce data  Experience translating business analysis into consumer products strategy  Strong communication and interpersonal skills; must be personable yet persistent  Enthusiastic, creative, entrepreneurial, self-starter attitude  High level of intellectual curiosity and comfort with ambiguity
